steps.description: Stir together apricot nectar, pineapple juice, water, and orange juice concentrate in a large pitcher until combined. Pour in bottle of sparkling wine just before serving.

title: Party Mimosa
ingredients_source_text: - 1 (12 ounce) can apricot-mango nectar - 1 (12 ounce) can pineapple juice - 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed and undiluted - 1 (750 milliliter) bottle cold champagne - 3/4 cup cold water
directions_source_text: 1. Stir together apricot nectar, pineapple juice, water, and orange juice concentrate in a large pitcher until combined. Pour in bottle of sparkling wine just before serving.
